chef_philosophy.title: Chef Philosophy
chef_philosophy.text: Our philosophy centers around precision, seasonal ingredients, and emotional storytelling through food.

hero.title: Celestial in spirit. Precise in execution.
hero.description: Through thoughtful technique and carefully sourced ingredients, each dish is designed to feel refined yet warm.
